1) Use new bolts.

2) Use new nuts.

3) A further tightening to ( 8 Nm ) is required after a 5 minute waiting period.

4) Observe tightening sequence.

1 ) Document toothed belt replacement on toothed belt sticker.
2 ) Use only anti-freeze 19 40 656 / 90 297 545 (blue) up to MY 2001 and only anti-freeze 19 40 650 / 09 194 431 (red) as of MY 2001 and ensure a concentration of 50% water and 50% anti-freeze.
3 ) At a coolant temperature of 20 °C.
4 ) "X" must be 30 or greater than 30.
5 ) Engine idling at operating temperature.
6 ) Resurfacing of the cylinder head is not permitted.
7 ) After re-boring, the old index must be invalidated and the new oversizing index must be embossed.
8 ) Arrange gap of upper oil scraper ring 25 to 50 mm offset to the left and gap of the lower ring 25 to 50 mm offset to the right relative to the gap of the lower intermediate ring.

torqueValues.context:
3) A further tightening to ( 8 Nm
) is required after a 5 minute waiting period.
